telemetry.desc: By choosing to send telemetry data, you can help us improve the overall user experience of FastGPT.
telemetry.title: Send Anonymous Usage Data

clear.desc: This will clear all conversation data, including agent, files, messages, plugins, etc.
clear.success: All chat messages have been cleared
clear.title: Clear All Chat Messages

reset.desc: Reset all settings to default values.
reset.title: Reset All Settings

checker.desc: Test if the Api Key and proxy address are filled in correctly.
checker.title: Connectivity Check

customModelCards.confirmDelete: You are about to delete this custom model, this action cannot be undone, please proceed with caution.

azureDeployName.extra: The field actually requested in Azure OpenAI.
azureDeployName.placeholder: Enter the model deployment name in Azure
azureDeployName.title: Model Deployment Name

displayName.placeholder: Enter the display name of the model, such as ChatGPT, GPT-4, etc.
displayName.title: Model Display Name

files.extra: The current FastGPT file upload implementation is only a temporary solution.
files.title: Support File Upload

functionCall.extra: This configuration will only enable the function call capability in FastGPT.
functionCall.title: Support Function Call

id.extra: Will be displayed as the model tag.
id.placeholder: Enter the model ID, e.g., gpt-4-turbo-preview or claude-2.1
id.title: Model ID

vision.extra: This configuration will only enable the image upload feature in FastGPT.
vision.title: Support Vision Recognition

fetchOnClient.desc: Client request mode directly initiates session requests from the browser to improve response speed.
fetchOnClient.title: Use Client Request Mode

modelList.desc: Select the models to display in the session; the selected models will be shown in the model list.
modelList.placeholder: Please select a model from the list
modelList.title: Model List

proxyUrl.desc: Apart from the default address, it must include https://
proxyUrl.title: API Proxy Address

llm.waitingForMore: More models are <1> planned for integration</1>, stay tuned ✨

download.desc: Ollama is downloading this model, please try not to close this page. The download will resume from where it stopped if restarted.
download.title: Downloading Model {{model}}

plugin.empty: No installed plugins yet, feel free to visit the <1>Plugin Store</1> to explore.

settings.hint: Please fill in the following configurations based on the description.
settings.title: {{id}} Plugin Configuration

autoCreateTopicThreshold.desc: Automatically create a topic when the current message count exceeds this value
autoCreateTopicThreshold.title: Message Threshold

compressThreshold.desc: Compress historical messages when the uncompressed messages exceed this value
compressThreshold.title: History Message Compression Threshold

enableAutoCreateTopic.desc: Whether to automatically create a topic during the conversation, only effective in temporary topics
enableAutoCreateTopic.title: Auto Create Topic

historyCount.desc: Number of messages carried in each request (including the latest questions asked. Each question and answer count as 1)
historyCount.title: Attached Message Count

inputTemplate.desc: The user's latest message will be filled into this template
inputTemplate.placeholder: The input template {{text}} will be replaced by real-time input information
inputTemplate.title: User Input Preprocessing

frequencyPenalty.desc: The larger the value, the more likely to reduce repeated words
frequencyPenalty.title: Frequency Penalty

maxTokens.desc: Maximum number of tokens used per interaction
maxTokens.title: Single Response Limit

presencePenalty.desc: The larger the value, the more likely to expand into new topics
presencePenalty.title: Topic Freshness

temperature.desc: The larger the value, the more random the reply
temperature.title: Randomness

topP.desc: Similar to randomness, but do not change together with randomness
topP.title: Nucleus Sampling

accessCode.desc: The administrator has enabled encrypted access
accessCode.title: Access Password

signin.desc: Log in with a permanent account to unlock the application
signin.title: Sign In

showAllLocaleVoice.desc: If closed, only voices in the current language will be displayed
showAllLocaleVoice.title: Show All Locale Voices

sttAutoStop.desc: When turned off, speech recognition will not end automatically and needs manual click to end
sttAutoStop.title: Auto Stop Speech Recognition

sttLocale.desc: The language of voice input, this option can improve speech recognition accuracy
sttLocale.title: Speech Recognition Language

sttService.desc: Where browser is the browser's native speech recognition service
sttService.title: Speech Recognition Service

ttsService.desc: If using OpenAI text-to-speech service, ensure the OpenAI model service is enabled
ttsService.title: Text-to-Speech Service

voice.desc: Select a voice for the current assistant, different TTS services support different voices
voice.title: Text-to-Speech Voice

neutralColor.desc: Custom grayscale with different color tendencies
neutralColor.title: Neutral Color

submitAgentModal.metaMiss: Please complete the agent information before submitting, including name, description, and tags
submitAgentModal.placeholder: Please enter a unique identifier for the agent, such as web-development

deviceName.hint: Add a name for easy identification
deviceName.title: Device Name

warning.message: This feature is still experimental and may have unexpected or unstable situations. If you encounter any issues, please submit feedback in a timely manner.

channelName.desc: WebRTC will use this name to create a synchronization channel. Please ensure that the channel name is unique
channelName.placeholder: Please enter the synchronization channel name
channelName.title: Synchronization Channel Name

channelPassword.desc: Add a password to ensure the privacy of the channel. Only devices with the correct password can join the channel
channelPassword.placeholder: Please enter the synchronization channel password
channelPassword.title: Synchronization Channel Password

webrtc.desc: Real-time, peer-to-peer data communication. Both devices need to be online to synchronize

enabled.invalid: Please fill in the synchronization channel name before enabling
enabled.title: Enable Sync

webrtc.title: WebRTC Sync

topic.label: Topic Naming Model
topic.modelDesc: Specify the model used for automatic topic renaming
topic.title: Automatic Topic Naming

translation.label: Translation Model
translation.modelDesc: Specify the model used for translation
translation.title: Message Content Translation

tools.disabled: The current model does not support function calls, so the plugin cannot be used
tools.title: Extension Plugins
